description:
'''Robert Fudali''' (born 15 December 1969), better known as '''Rob Darken''', is a Polish musician and singer, best known for being the frontman for black metal band [[Graveland]].

He has also contributed to other local bands, such as Fullmoon, Veles, [[Infernum]], Oppressor (present Baphomets Throne), Legion, Wolfkhan, [[Behemoth (band)|Behemoth]] and North, most of which as either [[Session musician|session]] keyboardist or artwork contributor.{{Citation needed|date=July 2010}}
